name: KIISIISO Toilet Bowl Cleaners 40 PACK,Long-Lasting Toilet Bowl Cleaner Tablets with Sustained-Release Technology Against Tough Stains,Automatic Toilet Cleaner for Deodorizing & Descaling
short_description: EFFICIENT CLEANING: KIISIISO professional toilet bowl cleaner effectively removes limescale, rust stains and other stubborn dirt from tanks, pipes and other parts of the toilet with every flush. At the same time, they remove bad and pungent odors. Keep your bathroom toilet fresh and sparkling for a long time

LONG-LASTING: KIISIISO Automatic Toilet Bowl Cleaner is upgraded with sustained release technology. Each tablet will keep the toilet bowl clean for up to 15 days at 25° Celsius. A box of 40 tablets will keep the toilet bowl clean and fresh for up to 20 months. In addition, the lifespan of the cleaner in the toilet bowl varies depending on the number of flushes

FRESH & BRIGHT: In addition to removing a wide range of stains, KIISIISO long lasting blue toilet bowl tablets form a thick lubricating protection on the inside of the toilet bowl after each flush, effectively preventing stains from adhering and odors from dirt. Let you always enjoy a spotless and fresh toilet

EASY TO USE: Simply take one blue toilet tablet out of the box and place it in the toilet tank. Then, let it fully dissolve for at least 20 minutes until the water turns blue before flushing. (Please note, do not remove the water-soluble blue protective film) It will not cause any damage to the inside of the septic tank and toilet tank

IMPORTANT NOTE: Automatic Toilet Blue Cleaner tablets can reduce the buildup of dirt in the toilet bowl, but they are not a substitute for a toilet brush. Therefore, please clean the toilet bowl with a brush before first use to fully utilize the product's effectiveness

It hangs on the inside of the toilet bowl to help you maintain your toilet between deep cleaning your toilet bowl. It Not only cleans your toilet bowl with every flush, but it also freshens your entire bathroom. It fights toilets rings, helps prevents stains and has new premium fragrances. They last for up to 8 weeks, and are easy to use.

short_description: FIGHT BOWL ODORS: Neutralize unpleasant bathroom odors at the source with Lysol toilet bowl cleaner. Lysol's powerful formula kills odor causing bacteria, leaving behind an Atlantic fresh scent with every use.Leave your bathroom smelling fresh and clean.
KILLS 99.9 percent OF BATHROOM VIRUSES AND BACTERIA: Lysol Power Toilet Cleaner is tested and proven to kill 99.9 percent of bathroom viruses and bacteria (when used as directed). EPA Reg 777-70

DISINFECTING AND SANITIZING GEL:This powerful toilet bowl cleaner kills 99.9% of bathroom bacteria in 30 seconds. With 10X the cleaning power and 2in1 solution, Lysol disinfects and sanitizes your toilet bowl and toilet brush to help clean your bathroom.

POWERFUL STAIN REMOVAL: This cleaner powers through tough stains and toilet bowl rings in seconds to leave your toilet bowl sparkling clean. The angled bottle makes it easy to reach tough stains in tricky areas.

HOUSEHOLD ESSENTIALS & BATHROOM CLEANING SUPPLIES: Lysol is a leader in disinfection. Shop our range of household cleaning supplies including disinfectant wipes, toilet cleaners, air sanitizers, and disinfectant sprays. The best protection is prevention!

product_description: EPA #777-81 Keep your bathroom fresh and clean with Lysol, the #1 Trusted Disinfection Brand. Lysol toilet bowl cleaner has a powerful cling-gel technology that disinfects and sanitizes your toilet bowl by killing 99.9% of common bathroom viruses and bacteria. With 2-in-1 bowl and brush technology, disinfect your toilet bowl and toilet brush. This fast action toilet bowl cleaner effectively removes stains such as limescale ad minerals, toilet rings, and hard water for a pristine toilet bowl. Lysol toilet bowl cleaner kills unpleasant bowl odors at the source, leaving behind an Atlantic fresh scent to help make your bathroom smell clean. With a 0% bleach formula, clean your toilet bowl without the harshness of bleach. The best protection is prevention!

Available in an easy-to-use gel dispenser, these Lavender-scented toilet stamps help fight odors and help you do away with all the unpleasantries of toilet cleaning. Simply apply a toilet gel stamp just under the rim. No touching. No scrubbing. Just continuous, flush-activated, freshening action. Stain stopping freshness every time you flush. That's cleaning reinvented. Use Scrubbing Bubbles Toilet Bowl Cleaner to get your toilet clean, then get freshness to 'stick around' in your toilet bowl with Scrubbing Bubbles Fresh Gel Cleaning Stamps Starter Kit.

product_description: Lysol Brand New Day™ Clinging Gel Toilet Bowl Cleaner cleans and disinfects toilets and leaves a refreshing Lavender & Cotton Blossom scent. The thick formula sticks to the bowl to power through stains, and disinfects both the bowl and toilet brush². Lysol liquid toilet bowl cleaner kills 99.9% of viruses & bacteria* and eliminates 99.9% of odor-causing bacteria*. The angled bottle targets hard-to-reach areas, including under the rim, to leave your entire toilet bowl sparkling clean & disinfected. *When used as directed. Kills 99.9% of Enterobacter aerogenes and Staphylococcus aureus on hard, non-porous surfaces in 5 minutes **Kills 99.9% of Salmonella enterica, Staphylococcus aureus, Rotavirus WA and Influenza A Virus (H1N1) on hard, non-porous surfaces in 10 minutes. . ²For brushes made out of hard non-porous materials.

name: Better Life Toilet Bowl Cleaner - Tea Tree & Peppermint Scent Cleaning Gel - Liquid Bathroom Cleaners for Household - 24oz
short_description: POWERFUL GEL FORMULA - This throne-tidying gel toilet cleaner banishes build-up, removes rings, and destroys odors, leaving your toilet sparkling clean and smelling of fresh tea tree and peppermint.
WORKS ON - A household cleaner that works on nearly any toilet, even in an RV or a public restroom! This powerful formula cuts through rust, grime, urine stains, and mineral deposits.
NO MORE TEARS - Our gel toilet cleaner is made with no petroleum solvents, chlorine or bleach, added alcohols, added parabens, SLS or SLES - making it gentler on your eyes, nose and skin.

EARTH FRIENDLY PRODUCTS - Give a better life to the next generation and avoid the use of harsh industrial ingredients. Our line of gentle bathroom cleaning supplies uses some plant-based elements that are kinder to children and pets.
FOR BEST RESULTS - Gently apply the toilet deodorizer gel under the rim of the toilet bowl and let sit for 5 to 10 minutes before scrubbing with brush.
